uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.store

Interface IStore


  • public interface IStore
    Represents an instance-store associated with a MEKON Frames Model (FM). Both instances and queries are represented via instance-level frames. The frames representing instances must have function IFrameFunction.ASSERTION rather than IFrameFunction.QUERY, whereas those representing queries can be either, since assertion frames can also be interpreted as queries.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IFrame add(IFrame instance, CIdentity identity)
      Adds an instance to the store, possibly replacing an existing instance with the same identity.
      boolean clear()
      Removes all instances from the store.
      boolean contains(CIdentity identity)
      Checks whether store contains a particular instance.
      IRegenInstance get(CIdentity identity)
      Retrieves an instance from the store, if still fully or partially valid with repect to the current model, and/or info on current validity and on any pruning that was required in order to conform to the current model.
      java.util.List<CIdentity> getAllIdentities()
      Provides unique identities of all instances in store, ordered by the time/date they were added.
      CModel getModel()
      Provides the model with which the store is associated.
      IRegenType getType(CIdentity identity)
      Retrieves a representation of the type of the root-frame of an instance from the store, including info on the current validity of that type with regards to the current model.
      IMatches match(IFrame query)
      Finds all instances that are matched by the supplied query.
      boolean matches(IFrame query, IFrame instance)
      Uses the query mechanisms associated with the store to test whether the supplied instance is matched by the supplied query.
      boolean remove(CIdentity identity)
      Removes an instance from the store.

    • Method Detail

      • getModel

        CModel getModel()
        Provides the model with which the store is associated.
        Returns:
        Model with which store is associated

      • add

        IFrame add(IFrame instance,
           CIdentity identity)
        Adds an instance to the store, possibly replacing an existing instance with the same identity.
        Parameters:
        instance - Representation of instance to be stored
        identity - Unique identity for instance
        Returns:
        Existing instance that was replaced, or null if not applicable
        Throws:
        KAccessException - if instance frame does not have function IFrameFunction.ASSERTION

      • remove

        boolean remove(CIdentity identity)
        Removes an instance from the store.
        Parameters:
        identity - Unique identity of instance
        Returns:
        True if instance removed, false if instance with specified identity not present

      • clear

        boolean clear()
        Removes all instances from the store.
        Returns:
        True if any instances removed, false if no instances were present

      • contains

        boolean contains(CIdentity identity)
        Checks whether store contains a particular instance.
        Parameters:
        identity - Unique identity of instance to check for
        Returns:
        True if store contains required instance

      • getType

        IRegenType getType(CIdentity identity)
        Retrieves a representation of the type of the root-frame of an instance from the store, including info on the current validity of that type with regards to the current model.
        Parameters:
        identity - Unique identity of instance
        Returns:
        Representation of type of root-frame of relevant instance, or null if no such stored instance

      • get

        IRegenInstance get(CIdentity identity)
        Retrieves an instance from the store, if still fully or partially valid with repect to the current model, and/or info on current validity and on any pruning that was required in order to conform to the current model.
        Parameters:
        identity - Unique identity of instance
        Returns:
        Representation of instance-level frame representing required instance and/or any relevant validity and pruning info, or null if no such stored instance

      • getAllIdentities

        java.util.List<CIdentity> getAllIdentities()
        Provides unique identities of all instances in store, ordered by the time/date they were added.
        Returns:
        Unique identities of all instances, oldest entries first

      • match

        IMatches match(IFrame query)
        Finds all instances that are matched by the supplied query.
        Parameters:
        query - Representation of query
        Returns:
        Results of query execution

      • matches

        boolean matches(IFrame query,
                IFrame instance)
        Uses the query mechanisms associated with the store to test whether the supplied instance is matched by the supplied query.
        Parameters:
        query - Representation of query
        instance - Representation of instance
        Returns:
        True if instance matched by query
